INSERT INTO route ( userId, carId, startDate, startTime, periodic, startPoint, endPoint, startLatitude, endLatitude, startLongitude, endLongitude, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday, sunday ) VALUES (#userId#, #carId#, #startDate#, #startTime#, #periodic#, #startPoint#, #endPoint#, #startLatitude#, #endLatitude#, #startLongitude#, #endLongitude#, #monday#, #tuesday#, #wednesday#, #thursday#, #friday#, #saturday#, #sunday#)
SELECT last_insert_id() AS id
sqlMap.update: UPDATE route SET route.carId = #carId#, route.startDate = #startDate#, route.startTime = #startTime#, route.periodic = #periodic#, route.startPoint = #startPoint#, route.endPoint = #endPoint#, route.startLatitude = #startLatitude#, route.endLatitude = #endLatitude#, route.startLongitude = #startLongitude#, route.endLongitude = #endLongitude#, route.monday = #monday#, route.tuesday = #tuesday#, route.wednesday = #wednesday#, route.thursday = #thursday#, route.friday = #friday#, route.saturday = #saturday#, route.sunday = #sunday# WHERE route.id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT route.userId, route.id AS routeId, `user`.username AS profileName, route.startPoint, route.endPoint, route.startTime, `user`.firstName, `user`.lastName, car.number AS carNumber, car.model AS carModel, car.description AS carDescription, route.startDate, `user`.fbLink, `user`.twLink, `user`.goLink, route.periodic, route.monday, route.tuesday, route.wednesday, route.thursday, route.friday, route.saturday, route.sunday FROM route LEFT JOIN `user` ON (route.userId = `user`.id) LEFT JOIN car ON (route.carId = car.id) WHERE IF(route.periodic = 1, DATE(route.startDate) >= DATE(#startDate#), TRUE ) ORDER BY IF(route.periodic = 0, route.$dayname$ -1, 0 - DATEDIFF(DATE(route.startDate), DATE(#startDate#))), TIMEDIFF(TIME(route.startTime), TIME(#startTime#)), IF(#startLatitude# > 0 AND #startLongitude# >0, Haversine(#startLatitude#, route.startLatitude, #startLongitude#, route.startLongitude), 1), IF(#endLatitude# > 0 AND #endLongitude# >0, Haversine(#endLatitude#, route.endLatitude, #endLongitude#, route.endLongitude), 1) LIMIT 100
